claims.object: Oversized and complex illustrations or animations used as thematic sets to communicate emotions

surface_layer.definition: Digital illustrations or animations often larger and more detailed than emojis, used to convey emotions and themes in digital communication.
common_uses: Expressing complex emotions in messaging apps
Adding personality and visual flair to online communication

deep_layer.mechanism: Stickers provide a richer visual vocabulary compared to basic emojis, enabling nuanced emotional expression.
deep_layer.origin: Emerged from online forums and chat applications as a way to enhance visual communication.

relations: Similar to emojis, but more detailed

citations: Emoji-SP, the Spanish emoji database: Visual complexity
